name: MongoDB Command Generator
description: Runs a database command (as long as the command result is less than 16MB in size).

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: Optionally specify on which nodes to run and how many instances you want on each node.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of node handler, one of SingleNode, SomeNodes, AllNodes (leave empty for local execution)

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: The nodes to use for this node handler type

parameters.name: instances
parameters.description: The amount of instances per node of this handler type

parameters.name: stop_on_error
parameters.description: If set to false, Tuktu will not kill the flow on data error.

parameters.name: hosts
parameters.description: A list of node names, like node1.foo.com:27017. Port is optional, it is 27017 by default.

parameters.name: db
parameters.description: The database to query against.

parameters.name: mongo_options
parameters.description: All possible mongo options, all optional.

parameters.name: connectTimeoutMS
parameters.description: The number of milliseconds to wait for a connection to be established before giving up.

parameters.name: authSource
parameters.description: The database source for authentication credentials.

parameters.name: sslEnabled
parameters.description: It enables the SSL support for the connection.

parameters.name: sslAllowsInvalidCert
parameters.description: If sslEnabled is true, this one indicates whether to accept invalid certificates (e.g. self-signed).

parameters.name: authMode
parameters.description: The authentication mode. By default, it is the backward compatible MONGODB-CR which is used. If this options is set to sha1, then the SCRAM-SHA-1 authentication will be selected.

parameters.name: tcpNoDelay
parameters.description: TCPNoDelay boolean flag.

parameters.name: keepAlive
parameters.description: TCP KeepAlive boolean flag.

parameters.name: nbChannelsPerNode
parameters.description: Number of channels (connections) per node.

parameters.name: writeConcern
parameters.description: The default write concern (default: acknowledged). unacknowledged: Option w set to 0, journaling off (j), fsync off, no timeout. acknowledged: Option w set to 1, journaling off, fsync off, no timeout. journaled: Option w set to 1, journaling on, fsync off, no timeout.

parameters.name: readPreference
parameters.description: The default read preference (primary|primaryPreferred|secondary|secondaryPreferred|nearest) - see http://reactivemongo.org/releases/0.11/documentation/advanced-topics/read-preferences.html.

parameters.name: auth
parameters.description: The authentication credentials if authentication is used.

parameters.name: db
parameters.description: The authentication database name.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The username.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The password.

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: The coomand to run on the database
